title: Senior Software Engineer
description: We are looking for a Senior Software Engineer to join our dynamic team. You will be responsible for developing and maintaining our web applications using modern technologies.
jobDescription: As a Senior Software Engineer, you will work on cutting-edge projects, mentor junior developers, and contribute to architectural decisions. You will be part of a collaborative team that values innovation and continuous learning.
educationRequired: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or related field
fullAddress: TechCorp Tower, Bandra Kurla Complex, Mumbai

title: Frontend Developer
description: Join our frontend team to build amazing user experiences. We're looking for a passionate Frontend Developer who loves creating beautiful, responsive web applications.
jobDescription: You will be responsible for developing user-facing features using React, ensuring the technical feasibility of UI/UX designs, and optimizing applications for maximum speed and scalability.
educationRequired: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or related field

title: Data Scientist
description: We are seeking a talented Data Scientist to join our analytics team. You will work on exciting projects involving machine learning, statistical analysis, and data visualization.
jobDescription: As a Data Scientist, you will be responsible for analyzing complex datasets, building predictive models, and providing actionable insights to drive business decisions.
educationRequired: Master's degree in Data Science, Statistics, or related field
fullAddress: Analytics Pro Building, Connaught Place, Delhi

title: Product Manager
description: Join our product team as a Product Manager and help shape the future of our innovative products. You will work closely with engineering, design, and business teams.
jobDescription: As a Product Manager, you will be responsible for defining product strategy, gathering requirements, managing product roadmaps, and ensuring successful product launches.
educationRequired: Bachelor's degree in Business, Engineering, or related field
